CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
OldVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
OldVersion.description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
OldVersion.description: This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls
OldVersion.description: Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
OldVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Best practice configuration monitoring dashboard in Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft recommends best practices to ensure a smooth collaborative experience on Teams. Best Practices dashboard in Teams admin center allows administrators to monitor and promptly address any non-conformance across their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to inherit document library label from container label of a group/site/team
CurrentVersion.description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.
